feat: Complete Rate Card System refactoring with timeframe-based rates

- Removed all legacy fields (time-based rates, multipliers, base rates, etc.)
- Auto-calculated margins displayed in real-time
- Updated Rate Cards page to show timeframe information
- Enhanced rate card display with first 3 entries preview

Technical Changes:
- RateEntry now uses timeframeId/timeframeName instead of shiftType
- Simplified rate structure: only subcontractorRate, clientRate, margin
- Templates now required (prevents inconsistent data)
- Backward compatible with existing rate cards
- All TypeScript types updated and validated
